EmailTemplate.description: introduction e-mail sent to clients in order to collect information in regards to the website design
EmailTemplate.name: Website Design Introduction
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions - Website Design Contact
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
I hope that you are doing well today. My name is Jessica Shirer and I am the Project Manager for websites here at VinSolutions. I am contacting you in order to obtain graphics as well as content that you would like us to incorporate into your {!Project_Piece__c.Account__c} website design. If you could provide any of the following information it would be a great help.
1. Logos - The source file from you Marketing Department is best 2. Color Schemes 3. Phone numbers (toll free or local) 4. Current website address
Below are examples of our newest websites. These sites will provide us with a foundation to build your site.
http://albanymotorcarsonline.com/ http://miketoler.com/ http://britishmotorcar.com/
I have set aside time.... Please let me know if there is another time that would be more convenient for you and we can reschedule.
Thank you and I look forward to working with you!
Sincerely,
Jessica Shirer Creative Project Manager 913-825-6124 800-980-7488 x 226 www.vinsolutions.com
